Sentencas: Real-time simulation is important for the fuel cell online diagnostics and hardware-in-the-loop tests before industrial applications.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: However, it is hard to implement real-time multidimensional, multiphysical fuel cell models due to the model numerical stiffness issues.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: In this paper, the numerical stiffness of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell real-time model is first analyzed to identify the perturbation ranges related to the fuel cell electrochemical, fluidic, and thermal domains.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: Some of the commonly used ordinary differential equation (ODE) solvers are then tested for the real-time simulation purpose.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: At last, a novel two-stage third-order parallel stiff ODE solver is proposed to improve the stability and reduce the multidimensional real-time fuel cell model execution time.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: To verify the proposed model and the ODE solver, real-time simulation experiments are carried out in a common embedded real-time platform.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: The experimental results show that the execution speed satisfies the requirement of real-time simulation.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: The solver stability under strong stiffness and the high model accuracy are also validated.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications

Sentencas: The proposed real-time fuel cell model and the stiff ODE solver can also help to design the online diagnostic control method.
Titulo: Numerical Stiffness Analysis for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Real-Time Simulation Applications
